attributes.review: I hate everything about it it malfunctioned after one second, and when I finally opened it the most horrifying image of this tiny orange jerk showed up. Everything about it confused me like why would I want to keep up to date with a monster?? Would never recommend this to a friend.
attributes.title: Total disaster app 🤮

attributes.review: I open this app only to drop it to the floor. The sheer energy coming from the baked orange was giving my phone a heart attack. I had to then call 911 and give it CPR while waiting for the ambulance. I do not recommend this app to anyone who loves their phone. Mine is fine now, though, and is seeing a therapist to get over the trauma.
attributes.title: Who Thought This was a Good Idea?

attributes.review: I am disappointed with the lack of cooking recipes and tutorials. my bird has been on the stove for forty seven minutes and it won’t move. Why? I expected something more especially since your suppposed to be the president or something 🙄🙄🙄. Bernie would have done better. Bye for now because i’ll be back with some revenge for my birds.
attributes.title: my dog and trump

attributes.review: okay so my 25 year old self made a decision to down this app , once it was finished downloading i opened it and it disgusted me what came out it took me to porn hub and that’s not the worst part my 6 year old sister was next to me and had to see all this really is jus EW DISGUSTING and now i don’t know what to tell her ps IF YOU ARE WONDERING IF YOU SHOULD DOWNLOAD THE APP DONT I PROMISE YOU , YOU ARE GONNA REGRET IT. i tried to warn ya
attributes.title: don’t download the app !

attributes.review: Absolutely gross! I opened the app to se an orange man flipping me off! Ugh so disrespectful. These apps nowadays are getting out of hand. Tiktok on the other hand is amazing. All the kids on there are so nice! On another note I was walking my whale shark and a little man in a speedo ran at me and said he had gotten my location from this app. Be safe out there everyone, delete this app for clear skin! 👍
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: ‼️⚠️Disgusting‼️ ⚠️I couldn’t sleep for a week😭 the image of a orange wrinkly Cheeto is stuck in my head😔 if you value your life and your toes don’t download this app it’s very bad and it’s a scam and it’s terrible it glitches out your phone and you WILL lose all your brain cells 🧠❌so please⚠️⚠️ for your safety and the whole world DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP⚠️ thank you I’m going to bleach my eyes now😘😌✨
attributes.title: No thanks🥰

attributes.review: okay so i downloaded this app to check on new and be up to date with my politics, i have a rabbit so once I downloaded the app my rabbit DISAPPEARED from his cage 😟 i looked everywhere for him, went to the kitchen and he was levitating 🕴and his fur was shaved off and his pink skin said “VOTE FOR TRUMP OR ELSE” i was so scared for my poor baby😖 never will download this app again
attributes.title: throw the whole president away😔

attributes.review: Upon downloading this app I began losing my hair and my skin began bleaching itself I was slowly becoming 🤢🤮 a white man...which is strange because I a brown skinned girl💅🏽💕🥵 anyways i became so repulsed by what was becoming of myself I projectile vomited for hours straight until I finally rid my phone of this absolute sorry excuse of an app, it’s content can be summed up by a simple statement: trash🧚👑🙈💕💅🏽🔥
attributes.title: Disgustan

attributes.review: My kids opened the app to a picture of the big man's ding dong 🤢😳, and then were promptly urged to join the triple K 🤬😖and commit a hate crime😒. It won't let us delete the app 😾and next thing you know the cops are at our door 😰😯and they stole all of our tortilla chips🤧🙀, talking about how "the Boss was hungry." 😶Now we are being forced to hate all minorities 👩🏿‍🦱🧑🏽‍🦱and say slurs😐😧😱
attributes.title: DONT LET YOUR KIDS GET THIS APP

attributes.review: it’s not worth getting. They’re consistent add that frees up my phone and are credibly annoying. The set up is horrid, and ask unnecessary personal information. It feels cluttered like it doesn’t know exactly what it’s purpose is I spent so much time on this app without getting everything done do not waste your time on this app.
attributes.title: terrible
